author: regisxu
msg: Apply fix for HARMONY-4289: [classlib][prefs] test org.apache.harmony.prefs.tests.java.util.prefs.AbstractPreferencesTest should not depends on Internet connection
validating xml may need to access resource on internet, that may cause test
failure if testing machine can't connect to interent.
